name: Dead by Daylight
content:
game:
  appid: 381210
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2013
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2013
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2013
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Switching to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
